hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: Version
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description: Please select a drupal version for use

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
echo " #to save time I am just going to use existing images for most of this. #for the real system we'd want to have a real image store of our very own. FROM centurylink/apache-php:latest
RUN DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt-get update -y; apt-get upgrade -y; apt-get dist-upgrade -y;
RUN DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt-get -y install supervisor pwgen mysql-client postgresql-client
RUN rm -fr /app; mkdir /app;
WORKDIR /app
ADD http://ftp.drupal.org/files/projects/$Version.tar.gz
RUN tar -xzvf $Version.tar.gz; rm $Version.tar.gz; mv $Version/* $Version/.htaccess ./; mv $Version/.gitignore ./; rmdir $Version
RUN cp app/sites/default/default.settings.php app/sites/default/settings.php; chmod a+w app/sites/default/settings.php; chmod a+w app/sites/default
EXPOSE 80
CMD exec supervisord -n
" > Dockerfile
